raw_infobox.name: Chris Bosh
raw_infobox.caption: Bosh with the Miami Heat in 2011
raw_infobox.college: Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets men's basketball (2002–2003)
raw_infobox.highlights:
* 2× NBA champion (2012, 2013)
* 11× NBA All-Star (2006–2016)
* All-NBA Second Team (2006)
* NBA All-Rookie First Team (2003)
* No. 1 Miami Heat#Retired numbers
* Second-team List of All-Atlantic Coast Conference men's basketball teams (2003)
* Atlantic Coast Conference Men's Basketball Rookie of the Year (2003)
* First-team Parade All-America Boys Basketball Team (2002)
* McDonald's All-American Game (2002 McDonald's All-American Boys Game)
* Texas Mr. Basketball (2002)
